text: Conor and Kamela have been together for six years. Like so many other people dating in the age of streaming, their first date included watching Netflix. As Conor started dreaming up how he wanted to ask Kamela to be his wife, he thought back to that first date. So, he enlisted the help of Netflix to pop the question â€” and it definitely delivered. Kamela's favorite show right now is the Netflix - original series Santa Clarita Diet, a zombie comedy starring Drew Barrymore and Timothy Olyphant. In what it's calling ` ` The Big, Elaborate Secret Netflix Marriage Proposal,'' the stars helped Conor and Kamela get on the road toward to marriage.
